prompt:
The following Java client code fails: 
'''java
package com.github.games647.changeskin.sponge.command;

import org.spongepowered.api.command.spec.CommandSpec;

@FunctionalInterface
public interface ChangeSkinCommand {

    CommandSpec buildSpec();
}

'''
The error is caused by a change in the API of the dependency: spongeapi 7.4.0->8.0.0. 
The new library version includes the following relevant backward incompatible changes on API. 
(API changes format: lines starting with '--' denote removed members, '++' denote added ones, '~~' denote mutations with change kind) 
-- org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandManager
-- org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandSource
-- org.spongepowered.api.network.ChannelRegistrar
-- org.spongepowered.api.plugin.Plugin
-- org.spongepowered.api.event.game.state.GamePreInitializationEvent
-- org.spongepowered.api.event.game.state.GameInitializationEvent
-- org.spongepowered.api.event.game.state.GameStoppingServerEvent
-- org.spongepowered.api.command.spec.CommandSpec
-- org.spongepowered.api.network.ChannelBuf
-- org.spongepowered.api.network.RawDataListener
-- org.spongepowered.api.event.network.ClientConnectionEvent
-- org.spongepowered.api.command.spec.CommandExecutor
-- org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandException
++ public CommandException org.spongepowered.api.command.exception.CommandException(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component,java.lang.Throwable,boolean)
++ public CommandException org.spongepowered.api.command.exception.CommandException(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component,java.lang.Throwable)
++ public CommandException org.spongepowered.api.command.exception.CommandException(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component,boolean)
++ public abstract interface null org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandExecutor
++ public CommandException org.spongepowered.api.command.exception.CommandException(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component)
++ public abstract interface null org.spongepowered.api.network.channel.raw.RawDataChannel

The error is triggered in the following specific lines in the previous code:
import org.spongepowered.api.command.spec.CommandSpec;
    CommandSpec buildSpec();
with the following error message:
[ERROR] /ChangeSkin/sponge/src/main/java/com/github/games647/changeskin/sponge/command/ChangeSkinCommand.java:[3,42] package org.spongepowered.api.command.spec does not exist
[ERROR] /ChangeSkin/sponge/src/main/java/com/github/games647/changeskin/sponge/command/ChangeSkinCommand.java:[8,5] cannot find symbol  symbol:   class CommandSpec
  location: interface com.github.games647.changeskin.sponge.command.ChangeSkinCommand

Please apply your reasoning and generate the fix following the system instruction.
